title: Add a sorted-comparison method to Authority
description:
The method should:
1. gather the authority's name and all alternate names (in other_designation field, semicolon-separated)
2. SORT each name alphabetically (i.e. "James Smith" would remain "James Smith", but "Robert Ames" would become "Ames Robert" and "James Clark Maxwell" would become "Clark James Maxwell")
3. return a sorted array of those sorted names.

This method will then be used for efficient comparisons with names that will be likewise sorted.

title: Investigate scrollspy offset
description: In the Manifestation#read view the chapter navbar uses the scrollspy feature to highlight the chapter the user is currently viewing. This is not working QUITE accurately. In many cases, the LAST chapter is highlighted upon page load, before the user scrolls anywhere. Also, while scrolling, the chapter highlight is a little off to what we would expect. Please investigate the current implementation and propose an explanation for this behavior. If you do identify a clear problem, fix it. REMEMBER the instructions in AGENTS.md about working in a feature branch and not pushing anything to existing branches; your work should be submitted as a PR on GitHub (i.e. origin/master)

title: Implement dict print page
description:
Print button does not works on a dict page 

E.g. if we open https://benyehuda.org/dict/24412/ and press 'print' button in a toolbar in top-left corner it opens empty page.
Code expects @print_url variable to be set, but it is empty.

Implement a printable view of the dictionary list and of individual dictionary entries, modelled on the existing #print action for Manifestations.

When committing this feature, mention "Fixed #717" in the commit message.

title: Prevent duplicate volume creation
description: When working on an Ingestible, users are selecting a collection to ingest into, optionally creating a new collection (usually of type volume). Sometimes, users mistakenly choose to create a new volume when one already exists. Prevent that through a clear warning shown immediately after attemping to save an ingetsible with a new volume-and-involved-authorities combination that exists. Also, search other Ingestibles in status :draft or :awaiting_authorities to make sure they have not already proposed creating such a volume, and likewise prevent creating the volume through this ingestible.
